Hi Ken, 
Unfortunately we do not have any monitoring policies at the moment on this topic although we do have a previously answered question that touches on vehicle tracking and an article that discusses the appropriateness and legal issues related to vehicle tracking that you might find informative.
-Previously asked question on vehicle trackinghttp://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20526/GPS_trackingvehicle_monitoring
-Supreme Court Cases Affecting Cities and Counties
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303602
I hope these resources are of use to you and your local government. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org
